attributes.action: Create a law that protects the British taxpayers from an incompetent government.
attributes.additional_details: A government is there to serve the people of this country and daily we are seeing that they are operating another agenda. Before the country descends in to chaos we should have the right to remove a very disliked government from office. Five years in this climate is too long to wait and long enough to do irrevocable damage. We should have the freedom to make changes instead of waiting until the next general election if the change is largely backed. We want our voices to be heard!
attributes.background: Create a law that protects British taxpayers and allows the opportunity to change government prior to the next general election, if they, go back on their manifesto, refuse to make positive changes, or are deemed as just plain incompetent and a liability, then we should have the right to remove.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign one or some of these petitions, which call for similar action:

"Require an election if 70% of the government manifesto isn’t delivered"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741176

"Call a general election if a government breaks an election manifesto promise"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/744946

"Give the British Public the Right to Vote No Confidence in the Government"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734311

"Introduce a mid-term referendum on whether to hold an early General Election"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734396

"Pass a law that triggers an early General Election via a public petition"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739383
